name: Le Sunset Salto
description:
The sun is setting, this is going to be your last salto off the cliff. But when you dive, the adventure only begins! Free a mermaid, feed a whale, fight an octopus, avoid the jellyfish, help the fisherman, find the treasure. 8 possible endings, and plenty of hints if you are not sure what is going on. And custom midi music!

Made in an archaic game making program from 1993, Klik & Play, which still is my tool of choice.
